mapper.select: select data_id,plain_text from tb_data_info where data_id in (select data_id from tb_data_info where account = #{account} and data_sub_id = "status" and plain_text = #{status}) and data_sub_id = "value" ;
mapper.update: update tb_data_info set plain_text=#{desDataStatus}, modify_time=NOW() where account=#{account} and data_id = #{dataId} and data_sub_id = #{dataSubId} and plain_text = #{srcDataStatus}
